about_the_game:
A full soundtrack containing 23 tracks of music from the game, all created by the world-famous Sound Composers Ramin Djawadi and Brandon Campbell.
Enjoy the many spectacular tracks that impressively shape the scenes from the game, including the rich story played out by the characters and the immersive battles.

※There is a bundle that contains this product. Please be careful about making duplicate purchases.
